comments:
Description:
NPE is thrown out when name column without input loses focus in Column Mapping dialog.

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a xml data source
2. New a xml data set, when Column mapping dialog shows up, click on Name column, let it get focus, do not input any value, then let Name column loses focus

Expected result:
No error

Actual result:
NPE is thrown out

Error log:
